tool.name: Circos based DNAPlotter
tool.description: plots genomes similar to Artemis's DNAPlotter
tool.command:
bin/cpt_dnaplotter.pl --galaxy --outfile_supporting $__new_file_path__ #if $file is not None: --file "${file}" #end if
#for $item in $repeat_track_key: --track_key "${item.track_key}" --track_feature_filter_invert "${item.track_feature_filter_invert}" --track_feature_filter_hastag "${item.track_feature_filter_hastag}" --track_feature_filter_textquery "${item.track_feature_filter_textquery}" --track_feature_filter_strand "${item.track_feature_filter_strand}" #end for
#if $enable_gc_skew_plot is not None: --enable_gc_skew_plot "${enable_gc_skew_plot}" #end if
#if $gc_skew_plot_window_size is not None: --gc_skew_plot_window_size "${gc_skew_plot_window_size}" #end if
#if $gc_skew_plot_step_size is not None: --gc_skew_plot_step_size "${gc_skew_plot_step_size}" #end if
--output_circos_confs "${output_circos_confs}"
--output_circos_confs_files_path "${output_circos_confs.files_path}"
--output_circos_confs_format "tar.gz"
--output_circos_confs_id "${output_circos_confs.id}"

param.name: track_key
param.help: Key to select from genbank data
param.label: track_key

param.name: track_feature_filter_invert
param.help: Should the qualifier search be inverted?
param.label: track_feature_filter_invert

param.name: track_feature_filter_hastag
param.help: Select a tag which should be present in that qualifier (e.g., signal/tmhelix/pseudo)
param.label: track_feature_filter_hastag

param.name: track_feature_filter_textquery
param.help: Specify text which MUST be in that tag
param.label: track_feature_filter_textquery

param.name: track_feature_filter_strand
param.help: Which strand should the feature appear on?
param.label: track_feature_filter_strand

param.name: enable_gc_skew_plot
param.help: Enable/Disable calculation of GC Skew Plot
param.label: enable_gc_skew_plot

param.name: gc_skew_plot_window_size
param.help: Window size for calculation of GC Skew
param.label: gc_skew_plot_window_size

param.name: gc_skew_plot_step_size
param.help: Step size for calculation of GC Skew
param.label: gc_skew_plot_step_size

tool.help:
NAME ====
DNAPlotter
DESCRIPTION ===========
Much like artemis's DNAPlotter, this tool plots genomes in a ciruclar fashion, and can plot gc-deviation tracks as well. The options are somewhat reduced compared to artemis, so if you need something that isn't available in this version please file a bug report.
USE ===
Each track has several parameters:
- track\_key
This selects a set of features from a genbank file, e.g., CDSs or tRNAs
- track\_feature\_filter\_invert
This parameter will invert (negate) the results of whatever query parameters you specify after it.
- track\_feature\_filter\_hastag
Require that a feature has a specific tag....
- track\_feature\_filter\_textquery
...with this specific text in it
- track\_feature\_filter\_strand
Which strand should the feature be on (not inverted)
Additionally, users are able to enable/disable GC skew plots. it's suggested that these are generally left alone, as they can quickly increase runtime.
